issue.title: TurboTax ReCaptcha Failures
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Ad blocking DNS incorporated into Asus routers:  94.140.14.14, 94.140.15.15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://turbotax.intuit.com/personal-taxes/cd-download/install-turbotax/ (specifically the desktop application downloaded with codes from Amazon, Costco, and other retailers)

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. TurboTax has been having issues with reCaptcha this year when importing data from banks and other financial institutions; in my case, the problem turned out to be AdGuard DNS; when I disabled that and flushed my DNS I was able to pass the captcha and download my data as expected.  Presumably there is something in the AdGuard filters that is breaking TurboTax's implementation of Captcha.

2. Screenshots

See this thread for examples:  https://ttlc.intuit.com/community/taxes/discussion/recaptcha-error-on-import/00/3425291/page/3
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7fe79bd0-f13e-4486-a65e-b15ebaa41d11)

</details>



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
